## \_formatShortDate() function

Formats a date to a short string. Format dd.m.yy.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function _formatShortDate(d: Immutable<DateInput>): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  d | Immutable&lt;DateInput&gt; | The date to format |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

a date string with format dd.m.yy
